channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Trump Loves a Man in Uniform
item.description: As thousands of soldiers prepare to march in President Trump’s military parade, what exactly will we see?

item.title: Why did Israel strike Iran? An Israeli politician and a US-Iran expert weigh in

item.title: Grieving Relatives of India Air Crash Victims Wait for Bodies to Be Identified
item.description: Families lined up for hours to give DNA samples so the authorities could match names to victims of Thursday’s crash, which killed at least 269 people.
